function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Larger droplets gravitationally pulled to surfaces within 1-2m","Impact":"Higher risk of surface contamination leading to potential exposure to infectious droplets","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces within the 1-2m range, use of protective barriers","Technologies":"Disinfection sprays, UV-C disinfection devices, protective screens","People":"Individuals in close proximity to infected individuals","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Long-lasting small aerosols with potential to transmit infection over great distances","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infectious aerosols, especially for unaware individuals","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, air purifiers, use of protective masks","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air purifiers, N95 masks","People":"General public, individuals in indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Influence of airflow patterns on the spread of infectious aerosols","Impact":"Unpredictable spread of infectious aerosols leading to exposure","Mitigation":"Airflow control measures, direction of airflow patterns, ventilation system optimization","Technologies":"Airflow sensors, directional airflow systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
